name: Who Wants to Rage?
description:
Made for Zero Word Game Jam.
Do you have what it takes to be a superstar?

Take part in the popular gaming TV show "Who Wants to Rage?", where your task is to collect as many yellow orbs as you possibly can. The only catch is, controls seem a little bit... weird.

Test yourself in this simple enough arcade game, where the controls seem to change and warp constantly. Can you figure out how to control your character and get the high score?

Music taken from Bensound.com
